data.enText: pots, dishes, etc. made with clay that is baked in an oven, especially when they are made by hand
the clay that some dishes and pots are made of
a jug made of blue-glazed pottery
the skill of making pots and dishes from clay , especially by hand

data.chText: 制陶作坊；陶窑；陶器工厂
data.enText: a place where clay pots and dishes are made

tr: ceramic ware made from clay and baked in a kiln
a workshop where clayware is made

value.def: You can use pottery to refer to pots, dishes, and other objects which are made from clay and then baked in an oven until they are hard.
You can use pottery to refer to the hard clay that some pots, dishes, and other objects are made of.

example.ex: Some bowls were made of pottery and wood.
example.tran: 一些碗是用陶土和木头制成的。

value.def: Pottery is the craft or activity of making objects out of clay.
value.tran: 制陶手艺；陶艺；陶瓷制造

value.def: A pottery is a factory or other place where pottery is made.
value.tran: 陶器工厂；陶器作坊；陶窑
